heading: Terms of Service
body:

## Use of Services

You must be at least 18 years old to make purchases through our website. By placing an order, you represent that you are of legal age to form a binding contract.

### Account Responsibilities

If you create an account, you are responsible for:
- Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials

- Specifications are subject to change without notice
- We reserve the right to correct pricing errors

### Orders and Payment

- All orders are subject to acceptance and availability

- Prices are in USD unless otherwise stated

### Pre-Orders

- Pre-order items will ship on or around the estimated date provided
- Pre-orders can be cancelled before shipping
- Payment is processed at time of pre-order placement

## Shipping and Delivery

Shipping terms:
- Risk of loss passes to you upon delivery to the carrier
- Delivery times are estimates and not guaranteed
- International shipments may be subject to customs duties

See our [Shipping Policy](/shipping) for detailed information.

## Returns and Refunds

- Products must be unused and in original packaging

## Warranties

- Covers manufacturing defects and component failures

See our [Warranty Policy](/warranty) for full terms.
